seo_faqs.section_title: Frequently Asked Questions About the Best Carry-On Luggage
seo_faqs.section_description: As a trusted name in the Â£145.1 billion global luggage market, Briggs & Riley has a wealth of knowledge to share. Here are some common inquiries we receive.

section_faqs.faq_answer: The best carry-on luggage meets airline restrictions and fits your specific travel requirements. Briggs & Riley offers numerous options to meet your needs.

section_faqs.faq_question: What are the weight limits for carry-on luggage?
section_faqs.faq_answer: Most airlines set specific weight limits for carry-on bags, typically between seven and 10 kilograms. It's important to verify with your airline as these limits can vary.

section_faqs.faq_question: Can I fit a laptop in my carry-on luggage?
section_faqs.faq_answer: Many of our carry-ons include space for laptops and other electronics, ensuring your devices travel safely.
